subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: There are weeks during the North American hardcourt summer when Kim Clijsters, who advanced to the Open quarterfinals Sunday, retreats to the house she owns in Wall, N.J., with her husband, Brian Lynch.
snippet: There are weeks during the North American hardcourt summer when Kim Clijsters, who advanced to the Open quarterfinals Sunday, retreats to the house she owns in Wall, N.J., with her husband, Brian Lynch.
